page.title: 17RECREATION IN CHAGFORD
page.content: Chagford has two{tennis courts,a {swimming pool,a bowling green,a {cricket pitch,a football pitch}and a {badminton court}in the Jubilee Hall. Also,at the{school}there is an{Adult {Education Centre}.This is where,on certain evenings,adults can take part in different activities,eg.{cookery, {woodwork,art,yoga,}etc. Throughout the summer the{swimming {pool}is open each afternoon and during most of the year the{tennis courts}can be hired for 1 hour at a time. There are teams representing the{Soccer, {Cricket and Bowls Clubs. Horse riding is fairly common and the immediate en_ vironment offers many opportunities for{walking}along quiet country lanes, over moorland or beside the River Teign. The recently formed{Recreation_ {al Trust}endeavours to co_ordinate the various sporting activities.
